title: Evaluation of MIA-CSO data with R
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install kwb.mia.evalCritO2 in R install.packages('kwb.mia.evalCritO2')  # Browse the kwb.mia.evalCritO2 manual pages help(package = 'kwb.mia.evalCritO2')

Plot All — hsPlotAll
text: Plot result evaluation forms barplots, default settings

title: Plot All — hsPlotAll
code: hsPlotAll(   strDb,   strTable,   myScaled = TRUE,   myReverse = TRUE,   myBeside = TRUE,   myCexNames = 1,   mySub = "",   dbg = FALSE,   myWidth = 1,   myValLabs = FALSE,   yearsInSub = FALSE,   lng = "de",   ... )

title: Plot All — hsPlotAll
text: strDb path Microsoft Access Database file strTable name database table containing data plot myScaled logical. Default: TRUE myReverse logical. Default: TRUE myBeside TRUE (default), bars plotted side side myCexNames character expansion factor names mySub subtitle. Default: "" dbg TRUE, debug messages shown myWidth bar width. Default: 1 myValLabs logical. Default: FALSE yearsInSub logical. Default: FALSE lng language code, one "en" (English, default) "de" (German) ... arguments passed hsPlotCritEvents
